benchmark_details.name: Dense360-Bench
benchmark_details.overview: Dense360-Bench is the first benchmark for evaluating and advancing research on MLLMs in omnidirectional captioning and grounding tasks.
benchmark_details.data_type: entity-grounded panoramic scene descriptions, entity-level captions, referring expressions

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate MLLMs on omnidirectional captioning and grounding tasks, facilitating a comprehensive framework for advancing visual-language understanding in panoramic settings.

data.size: 160,000 panoramas, 5 million dense entity-level captions, 1 million unique referring expressions, 100,000 entity-grounded panoramic scene descriptions

methodology.calculation: Evaluates grounding performance using mask IoU and captioning performance using recall of key phrases.
methodology.interpretation: Higher recall and IoU indicate better MLLM understanding of omnidirectional panoramas.
